attributes.action: REDUCING MPS IN LINE WITH POLICE / NURSES ETC
attributes.additional_details: With the severe cuts being made to all the services such as Hospitals, Police, Court Service, Army etc it seems to me to be grossly unfair that the one that is remaining in tact is the number of MP's I am sure that the vast majority of voters would agree that the number should be reduced thereby saving on Travel, Expenses, Salaries etc - my proposal is reduce the number of MPs.
